post_message: A sixth-grader died Tuesday after a bully stomped on his chest during a P.E. class at a Colton elementary school, the boy's parents told KTLA.  "This kid did it on purpose," said Jose Gallegos, whose 12-year-old son Dominick died after losing consciousness on the field.   However, detectives who went to the hospital where Dominick was taken said there was no evidence of an assault or physical injury that would have caused his death. Investigators are waiting for a report from the coroner's office.   Read KTLA's story here: @webpagelink
